panels.description: Shows the current build version of the Walrus Storage Node.
panels.title: Build Version

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the Walrus network.
panels.title: Chain ID

panels.description: Displays the current epoch number in the Walrus network, indicating the network's operational state.
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Displays the total uptime of the Walrus Storage Node in days, indicating its operational status.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Displays the timeline of Walrus Storage Node epoch states, highlighting transitions between inactive (0) and active (1) statuses.
panels.title: Epoch State Timeline

panels.description: Displays the uptime trend status of the Walrus Storage Node. Green indicates uptime is increasing, and red indicates it is not.
panels.title: Uptime Timeline

panels.description: Displays the current checkpoint lag between the local store and the full node in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Checkpoint Lag

panels.description: Displays the number of active workers in the checkpoint downloader's worker pool for the Walrus network.
panels.title: Active Workers

panels.description: Displays the total number of checkpoints downloaded by the event processor in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Total Downloaded Checkpoints

panels.description: Displays the latest full checkpoint downloaded by the event processor in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Latest Downloaded Checkpoint

panels.description: Displays the maximum checkpoint lag over time in the Walrus network, helping to identify delays between local store and full node.
panels.title: Checkpoint Lag Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the latest full checkpoint downloaded by the event processor in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Checkpoint Download Over Time

panels.description: Displays the number of Walrus events currently in the pending state.
panels.title: Pending Events

panels.description: Displays the number of Walrus events currently in the persisted state.
panels.title: Persisted Events

panels.description: Displays the average processing time for each event type in the Walrus network, with color thresholds for performance monitoring.
panels.title: Average Event Processing Time

panels.description: Displays the progress of persisted events in the Walrus network over time.
panels.title: Persisted Event Cursor Progress

panels.description: Displays the total unencoded size of all uploaded blobs based on metadata.
panels.title: Total Metadata Blob Size Processed

panels.description: Displays the number of shards currently owned by this node in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Shards Owned

panels.description: Displays the total count of metadata operations (stored and retrieved) in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Total Metadata Operations

panels.description: Displays the total count of sliver operations (retrieved and stored) across all types (primary and secondary).
panels.title: Total Sliver Operations

panels.description: Displays the rate of sliver operations (retrieved and stored) over time, separated by type (primary or secondary).
panels.title: Sliver Operations Rate

panels.description: Displays the rate of metadata operations (stored and retrieved) over time, enabling a comparison of storage and retrieval rates.
panels.title: Rates of Metadata Operations

panels.description: Displays the rate at which storage confirmations are issued over time in the Walrus network.
panels.title: Rate of Storage Confirmations Issued

panels.description: Shows the block cache hit rate for each column family in the Walrus Storage Node over time, helping identify trends and patterns in cache usage.
panels.title: Block Cache Hit Rate Over Time

panels.description: Shows the total bytes read for values returned by Get operations in the Walrus Storage Node over time. This metric highlights read activity by column family.
panels.title: Get Read Bytes Over Time

panels.description: Shows the block read rate for each column family in the Walrus Storage Node, indicating the volume of data being read from the file system over time. Useful for analyzing potential bottlenecks caused by large blocks or queries.
panels.title: Block Read Rate Over Time

panels.description: Shows the block read count for each column family in the Walrus Storage Node over time. This metric highlights instances of direct file system reads, indicating potential cache misses or scenarios where the block cache is disabled.
panels.title: Block Read Count Over Time

panels.description: Displays the duration of HTTP requests for different routes and their status codes in the Walrus Storage Node over time. The right column in the legend shows the HTTP method, route (Name), and status code (Status).
panels.title: HTTP Request Duration Over Time
